name: snowman
statement: Sistine wants to build a snowman from 3 large balls of snow! She will build the snowman by placing the largest ball on the ground, the second-largest ball on top of the largest ball, and finally, the smallest ball on the very top. Given that the 3 balls have a size of A, B, and C, what is the size of the snowball that goes in the middle?
input: The first line of input will contain 3 numbers: A, B, and C.
output: Print the size of the snowball that will go in the middle.
explanation: The largest snowball has a size of 7, and the next largest snowball has a size of 5. This snowball will be the middle snowball, so we print its size.
